Package nl.naturalis.oaipmh.api

Interfaces and classes defining the interface between the REST layer and OAI repository implementations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IOAIRepository
    Life-cycle interface defining the capacities of an OAI repository.
    IResumptionTokenGenerator
    Interface defining the capacity to compose a resumption token from the information in an OAIPMHRequest instance.
    IResumptionTokenParser
    Interface defining the capacity to decompose a resumption token into its constitutent parts.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BadArgumentError
    Convenience class narrowing the JAXB OAIPMHerrorType class to one for BadArgument errors.
    BadResumptionTokenError
    Convenience class narrowing the JAXB OAIPMHerrorType class to one for BadResumptionToken errors.
    BadVerbError
    Convenience class narrowing the JAXB OAIPMHerrorType class to one for BadVerb errors.
    CannotDisseminateFormatError
    Convenience class narrowing the JAXB OAIPMHerrorType class to one for CannotDisseminateFormat errors.
    IdDoesNotExistError
    Convenience class narrowing the JAXB OAIPMHerrorType class to one for IdDoesNotExist errors.
    NoRecordsMatchError
    Convenience class narrowing the JAXB OAIPMHerrorType class to one for NoRecordsMatch errors.
    NoSetHierarchyError
    Convenience class narrowing the JAXB OAIPMHerrorType class to one for NoSetHierarchy errors.
    OAIPMHRequest
    Standard Java bean modeling an OAI-PMH request.
    VerbArgumentMapper
    Maps each of the five OAI-PMH verbs to a set of required arguments and a set of optional arguments.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Argument
    An enumeration of the seven URL query parameters allowed in a OAI-PMH request.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadResumptionTokenException
    Thrown when a resumption token cannot be decomposed into its constituent parts.
    OAIPMHException
    An OAIPMHException is thrown in response to an error condition explicitly mentioned by the OAI-PMH specs.
    RepositoryException
    Base class for all exceptions in this library except OAIPMHException and ApplicationInitializationException.
    XSDNotFoundException
    Can be thrown by IOAIRepository.getXSDForMetadataPrefix(java.io.OutputStream, String) if the requested XSD cannot be served.

Package nl.naturalis.oaipmh.api Description

Interfaces and classes defining the interface between the REST layer and OAI repository implementations. OAI repository implementation only need a dependency on the api package (nl.naturalis.oaipmh.api). For convencience, the JAXB classes generated from the XSDs for OAI-PMH and Dublin Core are also included in the API library. No dependency on the REST layer is required.
Author:
Ayco Holleman
